titleStmt.title: Hermes theologus, or, A divine Mercurie dispatcht with a grave message of new descants upon old records no lesse delightfull in the best sense, then truly usefull for these times / by Theoph. Wodenote ...
titleStmt.author: Wodenote, Theophilus, d. 1662.

notesStmt.note: Running title: New descants upon old records.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
